sqlMap.select: /* WHOutbk.searchWHOCByBkDupCheck */ SELECT COUNT (*) AS OUT_CNT FROM TL_WH_OB B ,TL_WH_ALLC A ,TL_WH_ISSU S WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND A.WALC_NO = S.WALC_NO AND B.WOB_BK_NO = #wob_bk_no#

/* SQLID:wms.whoutbooking.searchWHOutbkList */ SELECT T.* , DENSE_RANK () OVER (ORDER BY T.WOB_BK_NO ASC) AS SEQ , CASE WHEN T.BK_STS_CD = 'BK' OR T.BK_STS_CD = 'LP' THEN 'Completed' WHEN T.BK_STS_CD = 'P' THEN 'Planned' WHEN T.BK_STS_CD = 'A' THEN 'Allocated' WHEN T.BK_STS_CD = 'I' THEN 'Issued' WHEN T.BK_STS_CD = 'N' THEN 'Booked' WHEN T.BK_STS_CD = 'C' THEN 'Cancel' END AS BK_STS_NM FROM ( SELECT B.BK_DATE, B.WOB_BK_NO, B.ORD_TP_CD, dbo.TL_GET_COMM_NM ('WB3', B.ORD_TP_CD) AS ORD_TP_NM, BI.ITEM_SYS_NO, BI.ITEM_SEQ, BI.ITEM_CD, BI.ITEM_NM, BI.ITEM_PKGUNIT, BI.ITEM_PKGQTY, BI.ITEM_EA_QTY, BI.INBOUND_DT, BI.LOT_NO, BI.ITEM_CBM, BI.ITEM_CBF, BI.ITEM_GRS_KGS, BI.ITEM_GRS_LBS, BI.ITEM_NET_KGS, BI.ITEM_NET_LBS, B.BUYER_CD, dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (B.BUYER_CD) AS BUYER_NM, B.CTRT_NO, dbo.TL_GET_CTRT_NM (B.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_NM, BI.EXP_DT, BI.LOT_04, BI.LOT_05, BI.FIX_LOT_ID AS LOT_ID, B.SO_NO, B.WH_CD, dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM (B.WH_CD) AS WH_NM, CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT (1) FROM TL_WH_ISSU I , TL_WH_ISSU_ITEM II WHERE I.WOB_OUT_NO = II.WOB_OUT_NO AND B.WOB_BK_NO = II.WOB_BK_NO) > 0 THEN 'BK' /* BK : X*/ WHEN ( SELECT COUNT (1) FROM TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN LP , TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN_ITEM LPI WHERE LP.LP_NO = LPI.LP_NO AND LP.LP_STS_CD = 'L' AND B.WOB_BK_NO = LPI.WOB_BK_NO) > 0 THEN 'LP' /* LP : X*/ WHEN ( SELECT COUNT (1) FROM TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN LP , TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN_ITEM LPI WHERE LP.LP_NO = LPI.LP_NO AND LP.LP_STS_CD = 'P' AND B.WOB_BK_NO = LPI.WOB_BK_NO) > 0 THEN 'P' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT (1) FROM TL_WH_ALLC A , TL_WH_ALLC_ITEM AI WHERE A.WALC_NO = AI.WALC_NO AND B.WOB_BK_NO = AI.WOB_BK_NO) > 0 THEN 'A' WHEN B.BK_STS_CD = 'I' THEN 'I' WHEN B.BK_STS_CD = 'N' THEN 'N' WHEN B.BK_STS_CD = 'C' THEN 'C' END AS BK_STS_CD ,ISNULL(B.CUST_ORD_NO, ' ') AS CUST_ORD_NO ,dbo.TL_GET_WH_PACK_MST_INFO(CI.PKG_LV1_QTY, CI.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD, CI.ITEM_PKGBASEQTY, CI.ITEM_PKGUNIT , CI.PKG_LV3_QTY, CI.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD, CI.PKG_LV4_QTY, CI.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD) AS PKG_INFO ,BI.RGST_TIMESTAMP ,B.REF_NO FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_OB_ITEM BI, TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM CI WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = BI.WOB_BK_NO AND B.CTRT_NO = CI.CTRT_NO AND BI.ITEM_SYS_NO = CI.ITEM_SYS_NO
B.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* CONTRACT NO */
B.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* WAREHOUSE CODE */
B.BUYER_CD = #buyer_cd# /* CONSIGNEE CODE */
B.WOB_BK_NO = #cond_no# /* BOOKING NO */
B.CUST_ORD_NO = #cond_no# /* CUSTOMER ORDER NO */
B.BK_DATE >= REPLACE (#fm_bk_date#, '-', '') /* Booking Date */
B.BK_DATE <= REPLACE (#to_bk_date#, '-', '')
B.ORD_TP_CD = #ord_tp_cd# /* ORDER TYPE */
BI.ITEM_CD = #item_cd# /* ITEM CODE */
BI.LOT_NO = #lot_no# /* LOT NO */
B.REF_NO = #ref_no# /* Reference No */
) T
WHERE (CASE T.BK_STS_CD WHEN 'BK' THEN 'X' WHEN 'LP' THEN 'X' ELSE T.BK_STS_CD END ) = #bk_sts_cd# /* PROGRESS STATUS(C/X/P/A/I/N) */
ORDER BY T.WOB_BK_NO, T.RGST_TIMESTAMP, T.ITEM_CD, T.ITEM_SEQ, T.INBOUND_DT, T.LOT_NO
